vocabInfos.lsjDefs: Pyrrhus, a proper masculine noun (not in LSJ)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Pyrrhus (the name of Sopater of Boroeas's father)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.20.4;
father of: Sopater (G4986)
§ Pyrrhus (the name of Sopater of Boroeas's father)
See also πυρρός (G4450)
